text: Ani tumhi vicara karala ki te jagata aheta vastutah te jhopata hote, ani amhi svatah tyaci ujavi davi kusi badalata rahilo. Tyanca kutradekhila guphecya tondasi hata pasaralelya avastheta hota. Jara tumhi ata dokavuna pahu icchile asate tara nakkica ulata pavalanni pala kadhala asata ani tyancya bhaya-dahasatine tumhi bharuna gele asate
